attributes.action: Abolish the BBC license fee due to biased reporting.
attributes.additional_details: Despite the BBC Trust being charged with ensuring impartiality, any and all impartial investigations find the BBC highly biased.
attributes.background: The BBC had for many years an excellent reputation of impartial news you could trust. Sadly that is no longer the case. Recent investigations have backed the widely held view that the BBC is totally left-wing biased   despite the fact that it is charged with providing a balanced view.
